description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. It is a refreshing hurling itself action game.  It damages it hurling oneself to the enemy.  If the enemy is dropped to the hole and all enemies are defeated, the stage is clear.  The story flows when the stage is cleared.  If all stages are conquered, it is a moving ending (with theme song).  The trial version is five stages.  The product version is 20 stages.
